name: The 5th Room
description:
Controls

A/D - Left and Right

Q/E - Place a poison mushroom cluster

Space - Jump

Mouse Click - Cast a Nasty Acid Spell

Jam Version Done (72Hrs In Godot/Krita)

As much as I want to keep pushing the last half hour I think it's best to let the errors show and call it a jam. Thanks to the hosts for doing this it really helped me change up my workflow this weekend.

There's a lot of bugs and I might polish them out through the week if I see the need for it.

List of things I wanted to do

Broken Stuff

  • Holy Hero is Broken ---> fix it
  • Dagger Hero is Supposed to Attack
  • Arrow Doesn't Launch Right
  • Particles dont show up in HTML version
  • 'Performance' Grading System is absent but is referenced

Extra Stuff I couldn't get to

  • Projectile Splash FX/SFX
  • Points Animations
  • Break Bell
  • Camera Shake
  • Level Up Mushroom Spell / Charges and Upgrades
  • More Spells (Had so many planned but I left it to the last minute)
  • Map drawing kind of sucks in some areas
Big Scary Crunch Time Notes

Im going to keep updating it up to the deadline, so much broken stuff I have to fix in the next 4 hours

  • Attack animations
  • Item explosions
  • Vfx for items
  • Controller override 
  • Wave generator tuning
  • Chest repair

Currently in emergency mode: tuning the game in the last hour always goes well right
